title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Friday, 3 June 2016 - BBC News
summary: carl langdell sentenced to life in prison with a minimum term of 26 years for the murder of essex teacher katie locke .
gang jailed over £ 50m cocaine haul at tilbury .

documents.title: that 's it for another week
text: that 's it from us at essex live today - to finish off we 'll re-emphasis this positive news from the met office
get the barbie out !
we 'll be back on monday morning with another look at the county 's news , sport , weather and travel from 08:00 .
have a great weekend .
nearly 10 °c difference in temperature tomorrow for southern areas as warmer weather finally arrives
hi , see our long range forecast here : if you tell me your location i can check thunderstorm risk ^elly
hi , kent comes under london & south east , no mention of thunderstorms in the 5 day forecast here : ^elly
wow it ca n't come soon enough ! ! .
any truth in the rumours of baking summer thanks to # elninó ? ?
hi , you can find out about summer and el nino in our recent blog post here : hope this helps !
^elly
hallelujah !
is summer arriving at last .
i 'm currently watching racing & tennis sitting under a blanket !
it has n't even reached 13 degrees since saturday in norwich .
6 days in the trot .
very unusual for late may/early june .
woooohooooo !
you can feel the drop in temperature already .
is this now the end of summer ?

documents.title: weather : cloudy tonight but looking warm and bright tomorrow
text: it will become increasingly murky through this evening and more especially overnight , as the cloud thickens and descends giving some fog .
the cloud will also be thick enough for the odd burst of rain or drizzle .
minimum temperature : 11c ( 52f ) .
tomorrow it will be a damp and misty start to the day with some fog along the coast .
however , this low cloud will lift and dissipate through the course of the morning , leaving a much warmer and brighter afternoon .
maximum temperature : 23c ( 73f ) .
get the latest weekend forecast for your area at bbc weather .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: drug gang found hidden in undergrowth in a 'state of undress '
text: some of the men jailed today for smuggling £ 50m of cocaine through tilbury were found hidden in undergrowth in a `` state of undress '' , having discarded their clothes in a pursuit , the met police says .

danny hannaway , greg spiers , tony rees , and danny o'sullivan ( left to right ) were all handed prison sentences for conspiracy to supply class-a drugs following a five-week trial at woolwich crown court .

the met police hailed the operation a `` success '' , adding it had delivered `` a significant blow against a sophisticated organised criminal group that was intent on supplying drugs to the most vulnerable communities in london '' .

documents.title: essex 's mickleburgh included in tonight 's t20 squad
text: essex have added batsman jaik mickleburgh to their 13-man squad for this evening 's t20 blast match against somerset at taunton .
the eagles go into the match on the back of a victory at glamorgan on wednesday .
you can follow the action here .
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: 'depraved ' first date killer jailed
text: 'depraved ' first date killer jailed

documents.title: in the news : instagram innuendo posts teacher banned essex look for second t20 successive win
text: here are the top stories we 've covered on essex live this afternoon :
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: essex primary school teacher struck off over instagram sexual innuendo messages
text: an essex primary school teacher who sent instagram messages filled with `` sexual innuendo '' to an 11-year-old pupil has been banned from teaching indefinitely .
kay elizabeth hollingsworth , 31 , told the boy she was `` single and ready to mingle '' and `` about to have a shower '' .
she was dismissed from the school in braintree last may for gross misconduct .
a teaching misconduct panel found her behaviour was `` inappropriate and serious '' but said she showed remorse .

documents.title: former police counter-terrorism boat on sale in essex
text: a former counter-terrorism boat once sold by kent police for £ 100,000 is on sale in essex for more than double the original selling price .
the sun originally reported that the princess alexandra iii was once again on sale at a boatyard in great wakering for £ 250,000 after it was auctioned off in 2014 .
kent police said it sold the boat `` as the cost of maintaining such a large vessel was not proportionate to the benefits it provided '' .
we 've been for a look around the boat with yard manager steve adams .
author: Chris Flynn
BBC Essex

documents.title: drugs gang jailed over £ 50m cocaine haul
text: we 've just heard from woolwich crown court that four men have been jailed after cocaine with a street value of about £ 50m was found in a taxi in tilbury .
about 200kg ( 440lb ) of the `` high-purity '' drug was discovered in holdalls in the boot of the vehicle when it was stopped on the a1089 near the docks last july .
the drugs were destined for sale in london and the home counties , the metropolitan police said .
the defendants were charged with conspiracy to supply class-a drugs .
they were :

documents.title: your on the beach at southend
text: thanks for this great photo rob in southend !
we love to see your share them with us using # esxlive .

documents.title: a reminder of what the previous shotley ferry looked like
text: before we cast off to other news here 's a brief history of the shotley ferry .
the previous vessel , taking people between shotley , felixstowe and harwich , had been run by alan sage ( until he announced his decision to retire .
having carried `` in excess of 150,000 '' people , mr sage said the `` time is right for me to stop '' .
mr sage 's boat , the explorer 12 , was built in 1984 and had been used on the route for 11 years , carrying up to 12 passengers at a time .
the new boat , the harbour ferry , now has capacity to carry 58 passengers on the route between suffolk and essex .
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live

documents.title: new ferry increases capacity for passengers between shotley , felixstowe and harwich
text: the new owner of the shotley ferry , which for the last 10 years has been a 12-seater , has been explaining why he 's decided to invest in a bigger vessel .
christian zemann , whose new craft will seat 58 , says : `` if the weather is good and the wind is calm there are always more passengers . ''
he added : `` i could not bear the thought of telling families with their kids , sorry we ca n't take you across '' , because of fears the children might be in tears for hours afterwards .
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live

documents.title: essex mp calls for sailors to be 'eyes and ears ' to look out for migrant boats
text: are you a sailor in the county ?
if so , the conservative mp for harwich and north essex , bernard jenkin , is calling on you to be the `` eyes and ears '' to look out for boats of migrants .
it comes after bbc essex found there are just five boats patrolling more than 7,000 miles of coastline around the uk .
`` i just hope all the sailing folk around essex keep their eyes and ears open and report anything sus jenkin said .

documents.title: essex pensioner prepares to take part in rio olym sort of
text: an essex pensioner is preparing to take part in this summer 's rio olym
now , 75-year-old rosemary head from laindon wo n't be competing alongside the likes of usian bolt she 's one of the thousands of gamesmakers who 'll be volunteering at the event .
rosemary is no stranger to life at the games - in 2012 she helped out at the london olym
i want to represent the older generation from great britain '' .

documents.title: nigel farage is coming to southend and he 's bringing 60 brexit boats with him
text: nigel farage is to set off from southend on a 60-boat flotilla up the thames to parliament to call for britain to leave the european union .

the ukip leader revealed he will lead the fleet on a `` small trawler '' to highlight the plight of british fishermen , claiming virtually the entire industry backs brexit because of eu fishing quotas .
the remain campaign says fisheries have to be managed to prevent over-fishing .
speaking on lbc , mr farage confirmed he will depart southend at 05:00 on 15 june .

documents.title: weather : cloudy but dry this afternoon
text: through this afternoon it will remain cloudy but turn drier with some lower cloud and mist possible .
maximum temperature : 15c ( 59f ) .
this was the view down at leigh-on-sea earlier .
weather watcher `` youcantbecirrus '' reported cloud with temperatures at about 12c ( 53.6f ) .
if you 're planning a trip out this lunchtime you 'll find the latest forecast for your area here .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: in the news : langdell sentenced for essex teacher murder nigel farage to lead brexit flotilla from southend
text: good afternoon , if you 're just joining us on essex live here are the top stories for the county so far :
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: that 's all from the langdell sentencing
text: that 's all from our live coverage of the sentencing of carl langdell .
to recap , he has been jailed for a minimum of 26 years for the murder of teacher katie locke on christmas eve .
you can read the full story here .
we 'll now take a look at other stories happening where you live .

documents.title: langdell sentencing : killer 's controlling behaviour highlighted in court
text: the main thing to come out of court today is just how controlling 26-year-old carl langdell is .
i heard only this week that he sacked his own defence team , so for the past few days he 's represented himself .
after the sentencing langdell , from roundmoore drive in cheshunt , asked the judge if he could correct him on one thing .
judge andrew bright responded by saying `` you will have to go through your legal team . ''
author: Tony Fisher
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: langdell sentencing : family tried to find katie after she did n't return home on christmas eve
text: we 've just heard from the crown prosecution service ( cps ) how the family of essex teacher , katie locke , made a `` concerted effort to identify langdell '' after she did n't return home on christmas eve .
adrian foster , from the cps , said friends and family searched the internet and contacted 26-year-old langdell , from roundmoore drive , cheshunt via facebook .
he told them miss locke had left in a taxi and he did n't know where she was .
her father , bill , worked out where langdell lived and drove there .
they found out langdell had admitted the murder to his mother .
police were called , and he was found and arrested .
author: Tony Fisher
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: langdell sentencing : suspended sentence for previous offence defended by police
text: the detective at the heart of the carl langdell murder case said a previous conviction for threats to kill a nurse had been `` taken seriously '' .

langdell , 26 , from roundmoor drive , cheshunt , today sentenced to 16 years for killing essex teacher katie locke , had been given a suspended sentence for the threats to kill offence - just 22 days before he murdered miss locke .
det insp fraser wylie said while langdell had a `` behavioural disorder , '' there had been no need to have him locked up as many people who have issues like that `` do not go on to kill '' .
author: Tony Fisher
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: langdell sentencing : first date murderer a 'vile and evil ' man
text: a `` vile , evil , controlling fantasist '' .
that is how police have described carl langdell , who sexually assaulted and murdered essex teacher katie locke .
langdell , 26 , from roundmoor drive , cheshunt in hertfordshire , was today sentenced to 26 years in jail .
det insp fraser wylie said langdell used dating websites to `` target young women '' .
author: Tony Fisher
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: langdell sentencing : parents of murdered teacher say killer will 'forever be a danger '
text: the parents of essex teacher , katie locke , have paid tribute to a precious , beautiful , bright , funny , and caring young woman .
they say they 've been `` robbed of a precious daughter , '' whose trusting nature was her `` downfall '' .
carl langdell , 26 , from roundmoor drive , cheshunt in hertfordshire , was today sentenced to life for murdering miss locke .
her parents said he will `` forever be a danger to the public . ''
author: Tony Fisher
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: langdell sentencing : judge 'doubts murderer will ever be released ' from prison
text: the judge at the sentencing hearing of first date murderer carl langdell said he doubts the killer will ever be released from prison .
judge andrew bright told st albans crown court he was pessimistic psychiatric treatment would bring about any long term change in the 26-year-old from cheshunt , hertfordshire .

he said dr philip joseph - `` arguably the country 's most experienced consultant forensic psychiatrist '' - had said langdell suffers `` from an emotionally unstable and dissociate psychopathic personality disorder '' meaning he poses a risk to women that .
`` is likely to remain significant for the foreseeable future '' .
langdell murdered essex teacher katie locke at a five star hotel on christmas eve .
author: Tony Fisher
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: langdell sentencing : killer had already been convicted for threats to kill before teacher murder
text: a man who murdered a young teacher on their first date was serving a suspended sentence for threats to kill .
carl langdell , 26 , sexual assaulted essex teacher katie locke before taking of her corpse .
langdell , from roundmoor drive , cheshunt , who appeared at st albans crown court via a video link from bedford prison , was jailed for life today .
in march last year , he was sentenced to nine months in jail , suspended for 24 months , for threats to kill - just 22 days before he murdered miss locke .
author: Tony Fisher
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: langdell sentencing : judge describes killer as 'depraved '
text: the serious sexual nature of the murder of teacher katie locke `` increased the depravity '' of the offence , according to the judge sentencing hertfordshire man , carl langdell .
speaking at st albans crown court , judge andrew bright told langdell , 26 , from roundmoor drive , cheshunt , that he poses `` a very great danger to women and young girls '' .
he added : `` i note that you have described yourself to others as a monster and a psychopath . ''

langdell pleaded guilty at an earlier hearing to murdering miss locke , from buckhurst hill , essex in the four star theobolds park hotel in hertfordshire and dumping her body under a bush in a ditch near a skip .
author: Tony Fisher
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: langdell sentencing : first date murderer must serve minimum of 26 years
text: a man who murdered a teacher on their first date has been handed a life sentence with a minimum term of 26 years .
carl langdell , 26 , from roundmoor drive , cheshunt , pleaded guilty to killing 23-year-old teacher katie locke , from buckhurst hill in essex , at a hotel in waltham cross on christmas eve .
the sentence was made at st albans crown court just a few moments ago .
author: Tony Fisher
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: breakingcarl langdell sentenced to life in prison
text: carl langdell , from hertfordshire , has been sentenced to life in prison with a minimum term of 26 years for the murder of katie locke from essex .
more to come .

documents.title: a week of rubbish weather for essex
text: we 're due some nice weather in essex over the next coming week , apparently .
it could n't come quick enough though as i do n't think i 've seen the sun this week .
on tuesday parts of canvey , southend and colchester were hit by flash floods .
it was n't much better on wednesday ( aka the first day of summer ) .
nope , still no sunshine yesterday either .
you guessed it , still grey today .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'seven ! ' chelmsford city make another signing
text: what have strictly come dancing judge len goodman and chelmsford city fc got in common ?
the number seven
the clarets have made their seventh signing in just under seven days after former southend youth team goalkeeper joe welch joined the club from st albans city .
new manager rod stringer is busy shaping his squad for the new campaign .

documents.title: langdell 'took photographs of dead body '
text: on day one of carl langdell 's sentencing yesterday , ann evans , prosecuting , said after the 26-year-old killed ms locke `` he decided to have sexual intercourse with her dead body after which he took photographs of her body on his iphone '' .

st albans crown court heard langdell ( to have his own law firm , but in reality had spent two years increasingly suffering from mental illness , `` which had been marked by periods in psychiatric hospitals '' .
`` the tragedy of this case is that katie locke , like thousands of other young people , having agreed to a date with carl langdell , accepted what he told her about himself , '' said ms evans .
more on this case later today .

documents.title: sentencing of carl langdell continues today over teacher murder
text: yesterday we brought you harrowing details from court as the sentencing of carl langdell began for murdering an essex teacher .
carl langdell , 26 , strangled and sexually assaulted katie locke ( from buckhurst hill , at theobalds park hotel in waltham cross on christmas eve .
the 23-year-old had been on a first date with langdell after they had met online .
he admitted murder back in march and he 's back at st albans crown court from 10:00 where the sentencing hearing will continue .

documents.title: weather : rather cloudy and dull day , the odd spot of rain possible
text: it 's a largely dull and cool start to the day , with some spots of rain .
through this afternoon it will remain cloudy but turn drier , with some lower cloud and mist possible .
maximum temperature : 15c ( 59f ) .
get the latest forecast for your area at bbc weather .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: good morning and welcome to essex live
text: today we 'll be following the second day of the sentencing of a 26-year-old man who murdered an essex teacher at a hotel on christmas eve .
plus , we 'll take a look at other news happening around the county .
feel free to get involved in the conversation at any time using # esxlive .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
